topic.title: Appendix A. How to create the Eclipse account

body.p: 1 – Click “Create an account” link. Default web browser will be opened with the Eclipse registration form.
2 – Provide information to the necessary fields and click CREATE NEW ACCOUNT

p.b: Figure A-1. Steps to register Eclipse account

body.p: Wait for special e-mail notification letter to finish your registration.

p.b: Figure A-2. Confirmation letter to register Eclipse account
